scripts.delete:reports: (if exist cypress\reports (rmdir /Q /S cypress\reports)) && mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mocha  &&  mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:run: npx prereport && npx cypress run; npm run mochawesome:merge; npm run junit:merge
